r.s: Framework for caching of arbitrary data.
r.d: With the PEAR Cache you can cache the result of certain function calls, as well as the output of a whole script run or share data between applications.
r.n: - Removed Cache_DB as it apparently never really worked. - Added trifile container. See http://atomized.org/PEAR/Cache_trifile.html for more information. (By Ian Eure)
